This page covers biological details of component Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Anterior Cingulate Cortex (CGA.NC.ACG) -> Medial Prefrontal Cortex (CGA.NC.MPFC) -> Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area (CGA.NC.DACG) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaEPA Neocortical Brain - Execution Planning Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 32
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Rational Thought Processes
  * *Notes to function*: Anticipate and detect targets, indicate novelty, influence motor responses, encode reward values, and signal errors, motor, attentional and cognitive functions
